entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 February 2023
